title: ARC BLAST
fullText:
rapid heating and expansion of air and molten metal resulting from an arc fault
Note 1 to entry: Arc blast is a function of current and equipment configuration. It is not a function of incident energy.
Note 2 to entry: The arc blast may result in metal and droplet spray, ejected debris, noise, and pressure wave(s) from buildâ€‘up and release from inside enclosed electrical equipment.
